content: youtube cuff work the gusset cast on 56 64 72 sts loosely using your preferred method round 1 needle 1 knit to 2 sts before marker ssk sm knit to end divide the sts evenly place the first 28 32 36 sts on the front round 1 needle 2 knit to marker sm k2tog knit to end needle - these will be the front/instep sts the last 28 32 36 sts will be the back/sole sts and will be worked on the back needle round 2 needle 1 knit to 3 sts before marker k2tog k1 sm knit if using dpns divide the sts evenly over 4 needles needles 1 and to end 2 will be the front/instep sts and needles 3 and 4 will be the round 2 needle 2 knit to marker sm k1 ssk knit to end back/sole sts round 3 needles 1 & 2 knit slipping marker as encountered tip use the cast-on tail to indicate beg of round until enough fabric is available to clip a removable marker to the work repeat rnds 2 & 3 until 28 32 36 sts rem on both needles redistribute sts and remove markers as encountered placing 28 work in k1 p1 rib for 1½ inches 32 36 instep sts on the front needle and 28 32 36 sole sts on the back needle leg knit every round until the leg measures 6 inches from the cast-on instep edge or desired length knit every round until the foot measures 1½ 1¾ 2 inches short of the desired length heel flap with ws facing and knitting flat on the back needle toe decreases row 1 ws k3 purl to end of row begin decreasing for toe shaping as follows row 2 rs p3 *k1 sl 1 repeat from * to last 3 sts k3 row 3 k3 purl to end of row round 1 front needle k1 ssk knit to last 3 sts k2tog k1 row 4 p3 *sl 1 k1 repeat from * to last 3 sts k3 round 1 back needle work as per front needle 4 sts decrease on round repeat row 1-4 6 7 8 more times there will be 14 16 18 round 2 knit garter edge sts for pickup after turning the heel repeat rnds 1 & 2 until 24 28 32 sts rem ending with round 2 12 turn the heel 14 16 sts each on front and back needles with ws facing continuing to knit flat on the back needle row 1 ws sl 1 p14 16 18 p2tog p1 turn work finishing row 2 rs sl 1 k3 ssk k1 turn work break yarn leaving a 10-inch tail using the kitchener stitch row 3 sl 1 purl to 1 st before the gap p2tog across the gap p1 close the toe of your sock weave in the ends rock your new turn work socks row 4 sl 1 knit to 1 st before the gap ssk across the gap k1 turn
